abstract: A Wells Fargo executive who oversees foreclosed properties hosted parties and spent long weekends in a $12 million Malibu beach house, moving into the home just after it had been surrendered to Wells Fargo to satisfy debts.
snippet: A Wells Fargo executive who oversees foreclosed properties hosted parties and spent long weekends in a $12 million Malibu beach house, moving into the home just after it had been surrendered to Wells Fargo to satisfy debts.
lead_paragraph: A Wells Fargo executive who oversees foreclosed properties hosted parties and spent long summer weekends in a $12 million Malibu beach house, moving into the home just after it had been surrendered to Wells Fargo to satisfy debts, neighbors told The Associated Press.

headline.main: Neighbors Say Wells Executive Used Foreclosed Beach House
